trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Elizabeth
There was one other sighting in Elizabeth on or around April 4th 2013
Summary: I went outside that morning and when I looked at the sky I saw a planet like object~ I also observed several jets flying in front of it spraying massive amounts of chemtrails
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside and saw a planet like object in the sky~I called several people to look at it and asked them what they thought. There were many planes flying back and forth spraying chemtrails. I felt excited and I ran inside and started taking pics... I have contruction going on and my doorbell kept ringing so Im not sure when I could no longer be visible~the chemtrails were very heavy so it was not too long before it was not visible. Im not very good at tech stuff so you can look at my facebook page where I posted the pics.
